attributes.action: support the BBC and prevent cut backs on unique services such as 6Music and Asian Network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent BBC review has resulted in the possible closure of digital stations 6Music and Asian Network, amongst a raft of other changes. We feel that this does not represent the public interest,as both stations service unique demographics not catered for elsewhere.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
